solution_line_template: In February, Bennett sold {march_sales}/{february_fraction_denominator} = <<{march_sales}/{february_fraction_denominator}={february_sales}>>{february_sales} window screens.
In January, Bennett sold {february_sales}/{january_divisor} = <<{february_sales}/{january_divisor}={january_sales}>>{january_sales} window screens.

Between January and March, Bennett sold {march_sales}+{february_sales}+{january_sales} = <<{march_sales}+{february_sales}+{january_sales}={total_sales_jan_to_march}>>{total_sales_jan_to_march} window screens.
